synopsis.text: Collecting and battling with miniature robots known as LBX (Little Battler eXperience) has become a worldwide sensation in the year 2050. Yamano Ban, a young boy captivated by the trend, has been forbidden from owning an LBX due to his mother's disapproval after his father's accident related to LBX. One day, a mysterious woman hands him a suitcase containing a unique LBX robot, claiming that it holds both hope and despair for humanity. As Ban and his friends delve into the world of LBX battles, they become entangled in a corporate war that reaches the highest levels of power in Japan. With the true origins of LBX battling at stake, Ban and his friends must fight to protect the future of their beloved hobby and the political structure of their nation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
